name: TapKick 2014
summary:
Join the Tapkick 2014 tournament ! - Simply tap when the ball is between the lines
See if you can keep the ball up longer than your friends !
The simple "tap" gameplay (famous from Flappy Bird) turns Tapkick 2014 into a game for everybody and all ages.
Pick your country from any of the 32 competing countries, and beat your friends high-scores and become the Tapkick 2014 king!
